title: Rush hour
brief_description: From 08:20 to 09:20 the commuters pour into London’s Waterloo Station. Using speed photography and the sound of the clicking clock, this hour has been effectively compressed into three minutes adding extra momentum to the rush hour at Waterloo Station.
